website_summaries.verdict: Interesting portable speaker design that gives you 360° audio coverage with a great battery life.
pros: Connects with Alexa to use voice control on the speaker, or you can run it from an app
per charge, which is a strong performance
Waterproof design, so you can use it safely in any location or weather
Offered in multiple colors, allowing you to pick your favorite
For a small speaker, it gives you a nice quality of bass
cons: A higher price point than some others
May struggle to hold a full charge after a few months

website_summaries.verdict: The UE Megaboom Bluetooth speaker one-ups its little brother with a range of improvements, including a larger size, bigger sound (particularly on bass), better waterproofing and extended battery life.
pros: The larger UE Megaboom improves on the already impressive sound quality of the Boom, with even louder sound and fuller bass
It's also waterproof, has upgraded Bluetooth range (and Bluetooth Smart) and excellent battery life

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, STOPS WORKING AFTER 9 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: after only 9 months, the product has completely stopped working. it wont turn on regardless of having a full charge. and it has had zero use other than normal speaker wear-and-tear. i never took it near the water or anything. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, SAVE YOUR MONEY AND GO ELSEWHERE.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lurie

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite "splurge" purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite "splurge" purchases, ever. I love using this speaker while camping, relaxing outside, or even when I have a house full of people. The sound is wonderful - I really don't think there's a better bluetooth speaker out there. I went through the entire line of Bose speakers, because i thought "Bose was best" - well, it's not. Bose hasn't kept up with technology or the times. I returned them all, even the $600 speaker - this UE MB sounds better than the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: David Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Bass blown after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was advertised to be the best choice for a solid bluetooth speaker. The Bass is completely blown on mine, after one month. I want to return this but I'm a week over my "return date". If I turn the bass down all the way, its the only method I have of enjoying the music (of course the lack of any bass makes it less enjoyable). I really am hoping to exchange this as I feel I received a lemon on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carl Veedock

customer_reviews.title: Great weather proof speaker
customer_reviews.text: There are already plenty of reviews on this speaker so I won't go into all the details other than I am pleased with the speaker. I use it on kayak and canoe trips so that we can have music on the water. Be sure to tether it to your boat in the event you tip over! My kayak capsized during some rapids on the river and the speaker was completely submerged for a short period of time while I was pulling everything to the shore. The speaker still performed flawlessly afterwards. I love the ability to link multiple UE Booms together and they sound great! (Must be done through the App... mine is iOS)
customer_reviews.author: G. T.

customer_reviews.title: great sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: Similar in sound quality to the Bose Revolve+ but on paper a lot more durable and water resistant and around $100 less, which is why I give it 5 stars. The bass is good at pretty much everything but max volume. JBL Xtreme has more bass but it's size is too large to effortlessly throw into a backpack like the UE Megaboom. I have had issues with the speaker (failure to charge) but that is why you buy from Amazon; problems were resolved quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPEAKER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is WELL worth the money, it is soooo loud and works really well in long distances. The battery last me all day on a 14 hour shift, and it charges quicker then ANY battery I've ever charged I Love THIS SPEAKER
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Family

customer_reviews.title: Failed within a week
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: couldn’t find the mega or the boom. It sounded ok at mid volume or so. Too much compression as you turn it up. I found I was using the EQ too much to try to make it sound better. It stopped pairing and charging within a week. Sent it back and went with my first instinct: Bose Revolve Plus. Couldn’t be happier. I wrote a review there too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Parry

customer_reviews.title: Buy new!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Originally bought used from “sole providers”. It was half price so why not... well because it was too good to be true. The audio quality was crap. Not sure if the speaker was busted or a cheap replacement but crap all the same. Tried everything to improve the quality; no luck. So back it went. I’ve used a Megaboom and this was not the same experience. Return was fast but don’t waste your time unless you’re lucky and have time to waste. 2. Bought new through amazon. Pretty much 2x as much but definitely worth $120. Exactly what I expected. All 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a joke. Starting off, I bought 3 and 2 of them had the seal already open so i was a little bit confused on why they would send me an opened product. It was also not in the famous plastic cylinder packaging, It came in just a tube and fell out when i took it out. Worst of all was the speakers. They state that this speaker has a 360 sound but you can clearly hear that the speakers are on the top and nothing on the bottom (I tested both of the already opened speakers) and they both sounded trash. I will be returning all three
customer_reviews.author: Vinh

customer_reviews.title: Take heed, the risk is greater than the reward.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a month...then done. There was no water exposure, no drops or bangs. It just stopped producing any sound despite factory resets, un-pairing and re-pairing, or pairing with other devices. Lights still work. An expensive lesson for me. I read plenty of negative reviews, and should have taken heed.
customer_reviews.author: Cale V.

customer_reviews.title: This is the junk after couple of months doesn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the junk after couple of months doesn't work or take a charge. Ongoing issues Lookout YouTube reviews and this is a big problem with these devices.
customer_reviews.author: Louis R.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound and distance value-add
customer_reviews.text: This version has excellent sound and a good range--more distance than my otherwise excellent Sony bluetooth headphones. I use the Megaboom both for general purpose and to accompany instrumental practice, for example, sending accompaniment from an iPhone app to the Megaboom, in which case distance is not critical, but clear sound above the instrument I'm using is. I like the simplicity of the Megaboom, and it pairs more easily than other bluetooth devices. It's a bit pricey, though, more so than the other models by Logitech. Thats the only neg. but you pay for what you get. Recommend getting one of the available covers if you plan to take it mobile.
customer_reviews.author: R. MAY

customer_reviews.title: You must buy his if you love good  Quality sound and bass .
customer_reviews.text: Love it just love the dang thing plus it’s my favorite color. The sound is so freakin rich and you can feel the air move on your hand, the bass is sick . You can control your sound buttons on your iPad,iPhone or just any phone for that matter. I watch movies on my iPad and use the bass on my speaker while I’m in bed oh..man is it like being in theaters ! You want a sick awesome Bluetooth speaker well here you go !!!
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Battery only barely outlasted the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted a little over a year. I went to replace it, spent $30 on a kit to replace it, opened it up and the unit was put together so poorly that simply removing the battery charging board bent the internal pins because the plastic housing wasn’t fixed to the board. Once bent they are too fragile to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Devil's Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Had issues keeping it connected to S8
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back and got a replacement, which seems to work much better. Maybe I just had faulty piece. Overall the sound quality is great, its LOUD and with good bass. The app is good. I like the fact that you can tun on/off the speaker using the app. Alexa integration works great as well. I did NOT like the Radiance color look. That was another turn off for me. The Radiance looks much different in real light. I would recommend to check it out in some brick & mortar store first, before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: BOOM BOOM BOOM!
customer_reviews.text: Its got loud and clear sound AND its idiot proof! The only thing I can complain about is its battery life. It is only good at 50% volume. If you blast it, don't expect it to keep pounding like the energizer bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished dud
customer_reviews.text: The product description stated the item had little to no visible signs of use and that the speaker worked perfectly fine. Upon receiving the speaker, I noticed the rubber end caps and side had multiple scuffs and scratches. The metal screw cap that can be used to hang the speaker was missing almost all of it's paint. It was obvious that this speaker had been used extensively before it was returned. I charged it for over 5 hours but the battery never registered past 20% when unplugged, and I was not able to connect it to my phone or pair it with my other UE Megaboom. The price was perfect, but this one turned out to be a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first as I had not owned a UE speaker prior, but wow, I'm a believer. Luckily, I was able to compare this to others (JBL, etc...) at a Best Buy first and the sound quality and dB levels were sellers. Great sound, super bluetooth range, battery life is at least 8+hrs for me (haven't needed longer than that). The sound quality is fantastic, even at high volumes. The tested JBL Charge and Extreme seemed to get static and lose base at high volumes. Haven't tried linking them but the app is also nice to upgrade the firmware. Not available on other options.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: UE MegaBoom vs JBL Charge 3
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, clear, and nice & loud. Similar in size to the JBL Charge 3, and sound is almost up to par with the JBL...but in my opinion the JBL has a much more all around sound. Even with adjustments made to the UE equalizer, the JBL still produced a fuller sound. Don't get me wrong, if I happened to lose this one, I would buy another one in a heartbeat. The JBL Charge 3 is a better sounding speaker, but the exposed woofers on the ends make it a bit fragile for an outdoor speaker. The UE MegaBoom on the other hand, looks and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Lance K.

customer_reviews.title: Probably going to return the speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speaker came slightly scuffed up and missing the cover to the charger and auxiliary port. I don't know if this affects the waterproofing at all. Along with the speaker was an HTC phone charger and a cable. When the speaker is moved, there is a sound of sand moving that could be some loose parts.
customer_reviews.author: Connor T

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to give to my mother as a birthday gift. Since it is pricey I bought it used to save some money. I received the correct color speaker, it works like it should, and cosmetically appears in good condition. The charger is a different story. I received an LG AC adapter that is obviously used as it is very scratched up and a cellphone charging cable from Novatel Wireless still in the plastic. The voltage on the included AC adapter is the correct voltage for the speaker and the charging cable is a standard micro USB so they will function as intended for charging the speaker. I was just expecting everything included to be UE as described.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Speaker not in it for the long run
customer_reviews.text: In all it is a pretty good speaker and has multiple uses from taking it to the beach and using it as a gaming speaker when you don’t want to have your headset on. My only problem is after two years of moderate use the speaker doesn’t even want to charge anymore period. With everything going on in the world tech support is hard to get through at this point in time. Very good speaker just not in it for the long run.
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Solid speaker and sound. Light enough to move from room to room. This is a *fun* speaker. Sound quality is not "audiophile," but definitely good enough for listening to rock, pop, and hip hop via bluetooth. Bass is nice, not boomy. Charge lasts a long time. This is the third UE "boom" product I've purchased. Assuming they keep up the quality, I'd gladly buy one again or recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: ocellaris7

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker! Great bass, treble and great experience overall.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great. Tested them against several other speakers and they performed exceptionally well. The speakers are fairly loud. I also bought the UE Boom 2 and they are also great. The UE Megaboom off course is much louder and also packs a harder punch. I was almost blown away by how good it sounded and how easy it was to set up(if you can even call it that). The bass was excellent, treble was good too. There is just a small distortion at the max volume but nothing that is too important. Overall, a great buy and one I would recommend especially if it is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 months, but still in action thanks to great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This was a 5 star product for 8 months with incredible sound - I LOVED it. Then it stopped playing any sound (including the power up and power down tone) unless it was connected to an outlet, even though it would pair just fine. I called UE Megaboom support and ran the updates, reset it as they guided me through, and no solution. Very disappointed that a product as expensive as this is not usable less than a year after I bought it. UPDATE: I have updated my review thanks to the great customer service. UE ultimately replaced the unit and I am back in action with amazing convenient sound. Hopefully this one will continue working!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Our son recommended the UE speaker and we're glad he did. We leave it on the kitchen counter and the music can be heard through the house (2700 sq. ft); we take it out on the back deck and the music follows us throughout the large yard. My husband gave his old speaker to our father in law; it was the first time he had seen a wireless speaker (he's in his 80's) and he was ecstatic with his new toy!
customer_reviews.author: mentorGrl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and it really is waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: The sound (and bass) quality is awesome for such a small speaker. And it really is waterproof...I stupidly left it outside overnight during a thunderstorm (with the USB port weatherdoor totally open!!!). I could hear the water sloshing around in it the next day, but it did turn on and it did play. I decided to let it dry out to be safe, and within a few days, it was playing and charging just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: UE sucked the awesome sauce out of this one.
customer_reviews.text: It used to be awesome, but the new app and firmware turned mine into a potato. Since the current firmware forces bluetooth to always be on, the battery drains after a few days even if I don't use it. The app used to have a feature called "Double Up" that allowed easily connecting two of these, but UE removed the feature from the app. If I could return it, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: One of the best speakers at this size/price
customer_reviews.text: Loud, decent bass, good battery, just all around great speaker. Much louder than a jbl flip 3 or 4, battery lasts longer, bass is much better. Highly recommended. Bought two for stereo, the stereo mode can be finicky when adjusting volume but otherwise everything's great. Has an app which used to be terrible but is now pretty useful. You need the app to update your speaker's firmware.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazinMosesLeroy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, but watch the price.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and charged it up. It was very easy to unpack, charge and connect to my iPhone. Worked flawlessly. The sound is quite amazing for the sound of the device. I would recommend it. The only knock I have on this purchase is that it was $250 one day and $299 the next. WTF Amazon? Prices shouldn't jump like that between the time you put something in your cart until the time you check out. I really wanted something like this, so I got it anyway, but I think $299 is a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Literally Amazing, I can't believe the quality
customer_reviews.text: Our RV has the crappiest speakers and I kept thinking there's gotta be a solution. The MEGABOOM is AWESOME! We download our Amazon Prime music and jam out! Now I'm saving up to purchase a second one to connect them and rock out even louder...and in STEREO! Battery lasts all day Sound is rich, highs are crisp and bass is good, even outdoors. Only complaint is the speaker used automatically connect with our Android phone but now we have to use the NFC to connect, probably just user error. This little speaker gets a big two thumbs up, but then again it better considering its so dang expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Gone With the WynnsTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 6-8 months
customer_reviews.text: We've bought a couple of these and each time, the recharging ability stops after a few months and after 7 months, they won't even play more than 5 songs while plugged in. It's really frustrating & they're quite pricey for the amount of time they last. If you plan on using it more than once or twice a week, definitely purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Budget101

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but i couldn't charge it up
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounded great for such a little speaker. You wouldn't confuse it with tower stereo speakers, but great for the shop or working outside. However, the charger it came with crackled and popped when I plugged it in. I contacted the seller, but no resolution yet. I'm trying to charge it now with a different USB charger, but it doesn't seem to be taking a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Grant H. Pound

customer_reviews.title: was malfunctioning when I got it
customer_reviews.text: When I got it if it was below 70 percent charged with shut off unless connected to charger now it won't even turn on unless it's connected to the charger would be a great speaker sounds wonderful but it's giving me nothing but problems since I got it and I can't even get in contact with the seller this is why I have a low rating
customer_reviews.author: brian cortez jr

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Bought 2. In less than a year both will no longer charge (both had never been in any extreme conditions, just sat on a table). HERE'S THE KICKER. Had one replacement sent per the warranty and it wouldn't charge right out of the box (probably refurbished speaker with same issue). Did all the trouble shooting and nothing worked. Dissapointing...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ultimate Ears Megaboom based on good overall reviews and price. I didn't care that it was an older model as the updated version had no additional features I cared about. The Megaboom sounds okay for what it is. I didn't expect to be amazed, so I wasn't disappointed with sound quality. What was disappointing was the unit's inability to hold a charge. Unless it was plugged into a charger, it wouldn't stay on for more than a few seconds. Not terribly useful. I've returned the unit and am now looking for a replacement. I found the control and connection locations to be inconvenient. The Android app was completely useless. It wouldn't even turn the unit on.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Ayer

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I spent over 2 hours on the phone with their technical support team to sync 3 speakers and they couldn’t figure it out!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pete kilabasa

customer_reviews.title: Tough and sound great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas in 2016 and it was worth every penny they paid I bet this speaker has over 2000hr of play time on it I use it at work just about everyday. It's been drop a lot left out In the rain several times handle with greasey oil covered hands. Been in the hot sun for hours and it still kicking would recommend to anyone looking for a good Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.author: Buckoff92

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: So, the speaker in my opinion surpasses Bose. I have a Bose speaker system and I tried their Bluetooth only to find this is far better. I do wish the buttons or a better design. Also I prefer this to their Mega boom, as the megaboom does not have an auxiliary input. And it's much better than boom 2. So if you were looking for a Bluetooth I suggest you purchase this. And the cost was affordable. Or at least at the time I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the color is great, the design is nice Cons: at a high volume, the "20 hour battery life" only lasted me about 5 hours. Huge disappointment. Also, it stopped charging after maybe the second time I used it, just wouldn't charge at all. Finally, my friend has the smaller, more reasonably priced wonderboom and it sounded just as loud as this one. Definitely returning and going to purchase a smaller one. For this cost, this speaker is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN and REPLACED
customer_reviews.text: I was quite excited to recieve the MEGABOOM. Several folks I know have one and I've been quite impressed. Unfortunately mine came defective. I tried to fix the static base sound thinking it had to do with adjustment but sadly realized something was wrong with the base component in the speaker, The sound was so bad I thought to just lower base. Thats how much I wanted to have the speaker work. Alas I have reached out and asked for a replacement and have returned the defective speaker. I will update once this exchange occurs Ok got my new speaker and I AN THRILLED!!!! Beyond happy 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound. One glitch though
customer_reviews.text: Super good sound. I us it for my out door yoga class and the sound carries for a quarter mile. The only problem is that if I pause my iPod for more than five minutes, the speaker turns off and I have to turn it back on. Not a good thing if I'm teaching in a studio and I want to use the music to wake the students out of relaxation. I say this because when you turn the speaker on it makes a drum roll sound. Not relaxing at all!
customer_reviews.author: LEENER126300

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker but this one had rattling/loose internal speakers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this returned/reconditioned speaker. This is my second purchase. But turns out internal speakers are rattling. So instead of returning I opened it up and fixed/glued the rattling internal speaker myself, thx to YouTube how-to videos. That’s how much I like these portable speakers.
customer_reviews.author: GMR

customer_reviews.title: A good buy in2020
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker after my laptop speaker gave up. my intention is to just have 2 of these for daily use. I myself love using IEM. however there are time i need a speaker in the house for everyone's entertainment. 2 of these are loud enough to filled the room. The bazz is good and boomy you can feel it. i got this cheap i consider this is a good buy however the bluetooth pair up is kinda stupid. device will always remember the speaker u connect but if u have multiple of these its always mannual link up
customer_reviews.author: Arthursoptic

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged Speakers, got a 2nd faulty unit, S/N don’t match!
customer_reviews.text: Order 1st speaker and it only took one full charge before it stop charging past 10%. Requested an exchange that arrive quickly. Notice the speaker had been repackaged. Also noticed the top part was not flush with the speaker mesh screen. The speaker sounded blown when I had volume all the way up. My assumption is that faulty units get sent out as is or with some refurbishment done. I won’t buy again from this seller and I’ll be asking for a full refund. S/N don’t match so 1st sign that this product isn’t new!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Benitez

customer_reviews.title: I hear the cellos!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know there were cellos in "my orchestra"! The UE Megaboom politely draws attention to all instrumentation with a full, glorious sound. Even non-techy people can enjoy the intuitive guidelines for set up, use and choosing personal balance preference for bass, treble etc. I'm sad that I couldn't get a response regarding receiving the USB cable that was described as included in "What's in the Box?" I'm borrowing one but I'd hoped to receive what I paid for. Besides! It will match the bright yellow adapter that WAS included. This is a hardy, trustworthy tool for adding joy to your hours of gardening or any outside work/play.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Speaker was cool for a couple months but definitely not what it claims. If you go above half volume the battery lasts maybe two hours. Bluetooth distance sucks. Pretty much stopped using it after the volume buttons stopped working about three months ago. Then after that one of the speakers started to go out and there was only music sound, no vocals. It's been sitting in a drawer for the last month while I waited for a response from the seller, that I never got. Worst $175 I've ever spent! Don't waste your money or your time trying to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is impressive for such a small speaker. This is our second; we’ve had our first for about two years and love it. Very durable (use it outside by the pool where it often gets splashed or knocked over on the concrete) and it still works perfectly. The only issue we’ve had is trying to pair the two speakers together using the app. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn’t...usually takes several tries.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Myers

customer_reviews.title: ... some reason my speaker came covered in scratches and dirty and dusty
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my speaker came covered in scratches and dirty and dusty. I guess somebody else returned it after using it because it was definitely used in a little upset I spent $200 on this speaker for a brand new one and got a used one what a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, initially had a Boom 2 that wasn't working well, when I returned that, I got this, and overall the volume isn't much louder, but the bass and fullness are amazing for something the size of a 1 liter bottle. Battery life is not great on full volume, it's better at around 65% Waterproofing works well as it fell into the pool without no issue. Would def reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Marc Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best things I’ve ever purchased on amazon and my roommates love it too whenever I take the speaker into my room I hear them outside searching for it , the sound is amazing and fills up the entire apartment easily, although it is a little heavy for the purpose of walking arround with everyday it is so convenient for house party’s or little get together with friends where multiple people can connect at the same time !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest bluetooth speaker. I got this for my Son for christmas. It fits nicely in a kayak cupholder and has really long battery life. Don't forget to download the app. I even pranked my son. Because you can have more than one device hooked up, I kept changing my son's station from 2 rooms away. I am super excited to get another one so I can use them in stereo mode. This has an awesome bass sound too. The packaging is pretty slick with a funky color charger and everything. It was the hit of Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AmaMom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had to replace the battery 3x already. This speaker was expensive, and for the cost, has not lived up to our expectations. It has been treated gently ( no throwing or dropping in our pool), used infrequently, and yet, has had connectivity issues and poor battery life, even with charging. Wouldn’t buy again or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!!  Tried several different brands and this one is BY FAR the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound!! Tried several different brands and this one is BY FAR the best, with great bass, treble and vocals. Found that the location for best sound is to place this about 8" from a wall or other hard surface, with the controls (+/-) facing towards you (not the wall); the wall helps beam the sound and provides extra channel separation. Very easy to use; thinking of picking up a second one now (they link and can be configured for stereo).
customer_reviews.author: glasdriver

customer_reviews.title: By far the best wireless speaker out there
customer_reviews.text: By far the best wireless speaker out there . I have a few different wireless speakers including Bose . The ue mega boom is hands down the best sound and has realy nice base. I ordered a second one in blue . So both speakers can now Play the same time . This is huge the sound is phenomenal. Five starts all day red speaker is three years old and plays like it was still new. They also hold a charge for almost four days. I play mine over 8 hours non stop at work so holding a charge that long is so nice
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a different model and the box came damaged and the Bluetooth kept going in and out. I returned that model and bought this in and I love it! The box is came in was very cool and nothing was damaged! Everything came packed tightly in the box and the speaker is beautiful and no issues with the Bluetooth! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: The Megaboom brought my Amazon Echo to life........sound was super. Unfortunately I bought March 30th 2019 and it stopped working July 10th 2019. I have tried everything including the U Tube ideas......I have not put it in the refrigerator as suggested. I am sad that I spent so much money for a product that doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: joliebln

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: We've had this speaker for over a year now and it's fantastic. Nice loud sound, battery lasts a surprisingly long time, it's very durable, and it is definitely waterproof (we accidentally tested this when it fell in a cooler of melted-ice water and no one noticed for quite a while). My husband is an audiophile and is pleased with the sound quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Jones

customer_reviews.title: amazing..
customer_reviews.text: amazing.... perfect.... we use it everywhere. lots of bass. great range. 15-20 hour battery life..... depending on how much you blast it. it's definitely waterproof - i know from experience. easy to clean. VERY well made and sealed. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. i'd give it 6 stars if possible. i also own several other bt speakers and this blows them out of the water (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: captainSly

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: After only one year, Mine was dropped in the water during my annual Saco trip and when I took it up from the water grant it that it was still playing but then stopped and wasn't ever able to take a charge again . If you buy this but the warranty as well. Just because its water proof doesn't mean it should go there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound spotty connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds pretty darn good for a Bluetooth device. And I'm picky. Unfortunately I've had connectivity issues. Using Mac OS 10, have to manually connect and disconnect the speaker at least twice before it works. when I bought at the description said that it worked up to 100 feet. Show me the signal has started to drop out at 20 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eckard

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its namesake!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty incredible for the size. 360° rich sound. Highs are crisp and doesn't distort at max volume. The app equalizer helps pronounce the mids. The bass sounds great sometimes and a bit muffled at others. I previously purchased a jbl flip 2...and while I enjoy the portability /size and sound, this UE mega boom brings it and then some!
customer_reviews.author: E. Pinder

customer_reviews.title: NOT new as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought the NEW Megaboom, but received a RENEWED speaker instead. Item arrived in a new box and labeling but when I opened it, the speaker had a small chunk of the rubber surround scraped off. There were wear marks on the bottom screw that allows access to the charge port and aux cable. The speaker also had a strong campfire smell. The charging brick also had wear marks on it. I returned it and may try buying from another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE, PORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this product and i had problems with the audio, it would become really staticy (If that's a word) and so i used theamazon return policy and i got another one. NO PROBLEMS with it and I use it every day! NICE, PORTABLE, LOUD, CRISP CLEAR AUDIO, GREAT BATTERY LIFE, EXCELLENT APP. would recommend over JBL Xtreme any day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. One of my most satisfying purchases. I have used it constantly for months and months with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. One of my most satisfying purchases. I have bought three total now, some being gifts for family. Runs longer than your iPhone batteries or iPad. I sync it to my daughter's and have stereo play. I only upload reviews after I have used a product for quite a long time. This is tough, durable, and battery has shown no signs or diminished capacity. Firmware upload was tricky first time, but subsequent uploads were easy and done through App without plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: HedgehogMissesFl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Life of the Party
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Searched for months and even bought multiple speakers to try them out. The fullness, clarity and volume of sound on the MegaBoom was excellent and better than the competition. The UE Boom 2 (smaller and more affordable version of this) had about 30-50% less sound and low range, so we splurged. Haven't regretted it once. We use it outside by the pool, hotel parties, large groups, home, everywhere. Good app for your phone to turn it on/off, control equalizer, and DJ with friends.
customer_reviews.author: FreshVet

customer_reviews.title: Lot of sound in a tough smaller package ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I haven't been able to use it more than a couple days ... However, the sound is nice. Main reason I purchased was durability compared to other products in this area. I have high hopes. I'm still getting used to the App and haven't been able to use other features - but so far we are all enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It seems great at first but the battery life is terrible. Using this in a big open area, like where I work, makes it almost impossible to hear. This speaker does sound good at home but most people are probably looking at this for work or outdoor activities. Bottom line is if you're going to spend this much money on a speaker, look elsewhere. Returned this, at least that was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love my MEGABOOM!! I use it almost daily. My wife was skeptical about spending so much on a speaker but once she used it she loved it. Great outdoors or for some ambient music in the background. If you want to blast out your neighbors, this speaker is fully capable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have critical buttons play\pause next\previous track, instead has a very un-intuitive "tap gesture" system where the system doesn't always detect your taps, or only one of two taps, and it's just very frustrating. Still it's very loud, good sound. Could have been a lot better if they had just put more buttons in it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: AFTER 6 MONTH APPROX 2 HOUR BATTERY LIFE MAXIMUM
customer_reviews.text: The battery is not as advertised. 21hours? Maybe on standby, w/o buletooth on... I have had this thing for 6 months now and the battery BARELY lasts more then 2 hours now. That is PATHETIC. super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Helm

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd UE Megaboom has been awesome since day one
customer_reviews.text: The first UE Megaboom I returned as it would not take a charge. The 2nd UE Megaboom has been awesome since day one. I use it every day in the morning getting ready for work. Loud enough indoors in small to mid-sized rooms. Have not used it outdoors too much. Bought a long key lanyard to carry it, but since the loop is on the bottom of the UE the power button is now the bottom of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tarsook

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after 4 months...no warranty support and no response from UE mega Boom support. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 14 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dec 2018. Good overall build quality, and good sound (not mind blowing). Few days ago stopped receiving charge. When turning on, says "critical battery, please charge," red light blinks for a few seconds and then it shuts down. Not worth over $100 that I paid for it. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: IST

customer_reviews.title: Not a new unit,
customer_reviews.text: Not a new unit, This is the second time I purchased this unit and did not match the serial number on the box
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo R.

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable speaker I have owned, and I've owned beats pills, jbl charge 2, jbl flip 2, and Bose sound link, none of them compare to the rich, room filling 360 sound of the UE. The sound truly surrounds you and it feels like the speaker is much larger than it is. Whatever little speaker they put in this thing must be very high quality, and not to mention the battery life is impeccable, have been using about a week straight off and on and it's still on full battery. I would reccomend this speaker to anyone who wants a higher quality speaker that will last them a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second original Megaboom. The sound quality and durability is amazing. The battery life is really long. We use it in the backyard pool all the time. I've never run out of battery. I'd recommend one to anyone that wants a good sounding bluetooth speaker that you don't have to worry about getting wet or dropping.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a little quieter than the regular boom but the thing is that this puts out higher quality. My roommate and i compared the two, the regular boom sounds blown out of proportion and you can for sure hear the difference. This has lower lows and a little lower highs but overall this is worth the extra money in my opinion if you can find it for about $150 to $180
customer_reviews.author: Marek Bauer

customer_reviews.title: This unit us amazing. The packaging is also incredible
customer_reviews.text: MEGABOOM is an understatement about this units performance. It kicks some serious butt. First time I heard it was in my churches sanctuary playing Sinatra's Come a Fly with me. I still can't believe to quality of the sound at high volume. This unit us amazing. The packaging is also incredible. It took me awhile to find the very hearty charging cable but it was there. I'd like to test out the waterproof feature and see how the speaker sounds under water for 30 minutes. You like loud? Buy it! You like portable? Buy it! You like something unique? But it!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN EGAN

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speakers ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have several other MegaBooms. They are all great and work together. One of the uses is as amplified remote wireless speakers for movies and presentations shown to even large audiences. With inexpensive carrying cases they are quite portable and well protected — long battery life and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: George Graves

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker on the Market, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I knew from reviews the quality of the speaker and the sound we're going to be great but I did hold reservations... I mean, it's a Bluetooth speaker. :-P However, it has far exceeded all expectations. I've used this speaker for a few BBQ parties and also just playing outside and my wife tends to come out and turn it down cause it's "too loud" (which of course warms my heart. Lol.) Love this speaker. I'd absolutely buy it again and recommend it to anyone looking for a great Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: SilverSuperman

customer_reviews.title: Superior long term quality.
customer_reviews.text: Superior product. High price, and high quality. I have traveled with this speaker to many countries. Use it all the time in construction and to play background tracks while playing live guitar. Has a reset for the occasional problem. Top notch design, superior long-term durability
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Best loud speaker for the money.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a solid sounding speaker, that is loud then this is it. Great quality, solid feel and easy setup. Had this for 1 day and is very loud. I would have to say comparing to my B&O the fidelity of the sound is not quite there, but again this is a loud and grab and go type of speaker. Have not tried this outside yet but I think it will carry the sound very well. Will update later!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: I Was Sent The Wrong Color Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Today, I received a used-like new, great sounding, fast charging, good battery, bright Lava Red speaker! The problem is, I ordered the Electric Blue color!LOL! It would cost almost half of what I paid, to send it back!, so, I'll keep it I guess! It also updated and pairs well, with my other Boom, Boom 2, and Wonderboom speakers! The bass is a little less than desired!, but enjoyable enough! The mids and highs definitely dominate! For the price, its a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: RicGillis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I had the UE Boom and it was an amazing speaker. But it came time to upgrade and i figured Id give UE Megaboom a shot. Im happy i did because this speaker is amazing! Its very loud and clear. Love the shock resistant and water proof feature of it although I dont test it out too much. My friends always compare it to the Bose soundlink and try to figure out which is better. Let me put it this way, if you are active and plan to bring your speaker places, then get the Megaboom. If you plan to keep your speaker in the kitchen or something then get the bose.
customer_reviews.author: Ekallas

customer_reviews.title: It was good in the beginning!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound I like it so far. Hopefully it will last longer than my nose speaker did. I didn't expect the speaker size to be as big as it was. All that speaker and it sounds like only the top half of the speaker gives off sound.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Great sound to share with a group
customer_reviews.text: One of my son’s friends had this speaker and wanted one. The sound is very rich. My son and his friends bring their ue megaboom to their swim practices and meets. They pair 2 and the whole team enjoys amazing sound. People come over and ask what speakers they have so they can go buy one. You hear it, you want it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have the UE mini boom and it finally died on me. Got this thing and I love it! Honestly I think the mini had better bass but it came with a special bass boost, but this thing by no means has a weak bass either. The only complaint is that on some songs it vibrates so much that it will scoot its way off the table
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: The UE Megaboom has a rather large price tag, but it is so worth it. Also, if you currently own a UE Megaboom or Boom 2, download their apps- it will allow so many more features than they advertise, like Block Party, Double Up, Alarm clock, etc. The sound is awesome, and I haven't tried out the waterproofing yet. The one downside is the USB plug- on my trip, I brought a Kindle Micro-USB charger, but it didn't fit. You have to use the included cable.
customer_reviews.author: Roen Wainscoat

customer_reviews.title: After ordering 2 only 1 worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 speakers so I could pair them and have a backup if I only needed 1 at a time. The battery in 1 of the speakers would not charge. After trying multiple outlets and different cables, I gave up and returned the defective product. So far the 2nd speaker works well and is a nice quality. Holding off on replacing the returned product until I have a better confidence that the battery will continue to charge and will be capable of charging from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, slippery and dishonest seller...
customer_reviews.text: So I'm sure this is a good speaker, but the one I received from a 3rd party seller was blown out. Absolutely no bass. In the place of bass, I was greeted with a loud, scratchy, annoying sound that made me want to pull my hair out. Not so good. Also, this thing is not waterproof. Against n, it probably would be, but the plastic seal that covers the charge port was missing. I'm a fan of UE, but not a fan of dishonest sellers (WirelessforDummies) who trick you into buying their trash product through complete mislabeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal sound. Absolutely suggest this if you like a boom2 but notice it’s a little too quiet by the pool, beach, party or other occasion. I held off getting this for a while until I saw it on sale and very glad I jumped on it. Best Bluetooth speaker I’ve owned Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Haunest Truth

customer_reviews.title: Died after little more than a year :-(
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ for a year. Charged it and it didn't take a charge...said battery critical after more than a day on the charger. For $100 I expected it to last longer. Company was not responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laudone

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't charge after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great just purchased a month ago already won't charge or stay on without cord plugged in the 2nd one I've had that problem with I've had 4 one I destroyed lost one and 2 just died shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a no go
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few times, but after a few uses the battery would constantly die! I hardly ever use it now because of the battery! When it dies and you plug it in you have to wait a while for it to even turn on and be able to use while on the charger. I've lost the charger a few times and tried to charge it with another similar cord and it was a no go. Wouldn't charge at all! Luckily, I found the original charger but even then it takes a long time to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound on the regular boom is better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to pair with the UE Boom we have already, and when they are paired the sound on both of them is lower. It is not possible to pair them without a phone app, so I can't use them both from my computer. The sound quality is lower than the regular UE Boom we already have for 2 years. Not so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaDav

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this speaker before so I know what it’s supposed to sound like and it does just that. I will contact the support team, however, because despite charging it consistently to maintain full battery, it always says low battery on the app and on the speaker itself which is problematic. Other than that, it came in perfect condition with no damages. Battery is the only issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound indoors.  Lots of playtime when using battery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker for my wife after reviewing different portable speakers that are on the market. She uses it at work with her cell phone. Sound great and she loved the color. very nice quality and pretty loud when indoors. Very long play time with batteries charged.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Took a 8 foot fall like a champ. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker for the money. No questions asked on that. Awesome bass and sound quality. Speaker quality is top notch as well. Left the speaker on top of my truck and drove off. I heard it hit the concrete. Left a small scuff but nothing else was damaged. Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker but battery life leaves Alot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the battery life on these things at all not even new ones you get from the store cuz I already have one and the battery life is no good on it either but I bought this to pair with it and they sound fantastic together or apart.
customer_reviews.author: JPC
